jobs.title: AI Engineer — Reinforcement Learning
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

Towards this goal, we are looking for a member of the AI technical staff to join the founding team. Someone technically strongly, and excited about building superhuman AI agents that take actions on the web.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

Responsibilities:

  • Build a superhuman generalist web-agent

  • Scale infra, data, algorithms for large-scale distributed async reinforcement learning with multimodal LLMs acting in web environments

  • Work closely with product engineers to translate cutting-edge AI capabilities into elegant and reliable product experiences.

What we’re looking for:

  • Experience with large-scale RL, ideally for post-training multimodal LLMs

  • Experience building distributed systems for RL (balancing trainer, environment, actor workloads)

  • Experience with ML infrastructure (GPU clusters) and supporting networking (NCCL)

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary and equity

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • 20 days of paid time off per year

  • Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

 - 20 days of paid time off per year

 - Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

 - Daily team lunches

 - Commuter benefits

 - Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

jobs.title: AI Engineer — LLM Infra
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

Towards this goal, we are looking for a member of the AI technical staff to join the founding team. Someone technically strong, and excited about building superhuman AI agents that take actions on the web.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

Responsibilities:

  • Scale infra for post-training of multimodal LLMs (CPT, SFT, RL, search, reward models)

  • Scale infra for agentic inference (throughput and latency of perception-planning-action loops)

  • Build the foundations of a superhuman generalist web-agent

  • Work closely with product engineers to translate cutting-edge AI capabilities into reliable product experiences.

What we’re looking for:

  • Experience with ML infrastructure (GPU clusters) and supporting networking (NCCL)

  • Experience optimizing post-training and inference performance of multimodal LLMs (data/tensor/pipeline/context/expert parallelism, optimizing MFU, throughput, latency)

  • Low level systems experience (Triton, CUDA)

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary and equity

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • 20 days of paid time off per year

  • Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

jobs.title: Create Your Role!
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

Towards this goal, we are looking for the brightest and most innovative minds to join our founding team. Someone excited and passionate about building superhuman AI agents that take actions on the web.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

Don't see a job posting that perfectly matches your skillsets? Apply here and tell us how and why you would be an exceptional match for our team.

What we're looking for:

  • You didn't see an open job posting that perfectly matched your skills and experience, but you're passionate about contributing to our mission within research, engineering, product, operations or GTM.

  • Demonstrated experience and expertise within the proposed role that you are applying for.

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary and equity

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • 20 days of paid time off per year

  • Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

jobs.title: Intern — AI
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

We have several internship openings to work closely with the founding team. We are looking for someone technically strong, excited about working in a small, high talent density team, building superhuman AI agents that take actions on the web.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

Responsibilities:

  • Build a superhuman generalist web-agent

  • Push the frontiers of post-training multimodal LLMs

What we’re looking for:

  • The ability to get neural networks to behave

  • The desire and ability to quickly test hypotheses with prototypes

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

  • Experience with post-training multimodal LLMs (CPT, SFT, RL, search, reward models) is a plus, but not necessary.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

jobs.title: Brand Designer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

Towards this goal, we’re looking for a detail-oriented and creative Brand Designer to help tell our story and establish our visual identity across digital touchpoints. In this role, you’ll work on brand systems, landing pages, and other marketing assets that define how our brand is seen and experienced by the world.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

What You’ll Do

  • Design and evolve our brand system, including logo usage, typography, color, and visual elements.

  • Design landing pages and digital assets that are visually compelling and conversion-optimized.

  • Create illustrations, icons, and graphic content for marketing campaigns and web experiences.

  • Contribute to and lead establishing Yutori’s brand guidelines to ensure consistency across all channels.

  • Bonus: Use motion design and video to enhance storytelling across web and social platforms.

What We’re Looking For

  • Experience in Figma.

  • Typography Mastery — Demonstrated ability to choose and pair typefaces effectively. You aren’t confined to a particular style — you know when to use serif, sans-serif, or even expressive display fonts.

  • Color Fluency — You can build harmonious palettes or use restrained color schemes to drive user focus and emotional response.

  • Graphic Craftsmanship — Strong portfolio of polished design work, including marketing illustrations and branded visuals. Being able to use cutting-edge AI tools (Midjourney, Luma, etc.) effectively.

  • Attention to Detail — Pixel-perfect execution in both static and dynamic formats.

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary and equity

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • 20 days of paid time off per year

  • Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.

jobs.title: Growth Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Yutori is reimagining how people interact with the web by building AI agents that can reliably do everyday digital tasks. We are building the entire stack to be agent-first, from training our own models to generative product interfaces.

Towards this goal, we are looking for a growth engineer to join the founding team. Someone scrappy, who believes in getting a lot of iterations in fast, and someone who'd be excited about translating cutting-edge AI capabilities into elegant and reliable product experiences.

Our founders — Devi Parikh, Abhishek Das, Dhruv Batra — have decades of experience in AI research and product spanning generative, multimodal and embodied AI at Meta. Our team combines AI experience with design-minded product thinking to build and deliver on Yutori’s mission.

Yutori is backed by a stellar set of visionary investors — Elad Gil, Sarah Guo, Jeff Dean, Fei-Fei Li, Amjad Masad, Guillermo Rauch, Akshay Kothari, Soleio, Oliver Cameron, Julien Chaumond, Logan Kilpatrick, Bryan McCann, Vladlen Koltun, Jamie Cuffe, Michele Catasta, etc.

Responsibilities:

  • Improve the speed and quality of our engineering process.

  • Design, implement and analyze experiments to drive user acquisition, activation, and retention.

  • Own and develop both frontend and backend systems that support growth initiatives.

  • Work closely with designers, product and AI engineers.

  • Improve the speed and quality of our engineering process.

What we’re looking for:

  • Strong engineering skills, especially in the stack: React, Typescript, Python, AWS.

  • Deep understanding of how the web / HTTP works.

  • Experience working with large distributed systems.

  • High IQ, high EQ, high agency, high craftsmanship, low ego. Proactive, clear communication.

  • Strong product intuitions. Passion to get the details right.

Benefits and perks:

  • Competitive salary and equity

  • Visa sponsorship and relocation stipend to bring you to SF

  • Generous health, dental, vision insurance for you and your dependents

  • 20 days of paid time off per year

  • Work laptop and budget to set up your work office

  • Daily team lunches

  • Commuter benefits

  • Small, focused team of high-potential individuals. In-person in SF.
